FILE: cm432436v11.0.txt
DYAD: MALI - NIGER
RIVALRY: RIV1051
DISPUTE(S): MID4308 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180601
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180914

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4308

TERRMID: MID4308 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4308 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4308 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4308 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4308 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4308 from Gibler 2018, Nigeran troops pursued rebels and chased them across the border with Mali. Malian forces opened fire, triggering this MID. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Niger. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4308 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4308 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4308 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4308 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4308
rivalry=432436 nationa=NIGER nationb=MALI MID4308 19930208-19930208 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=1-25 DEATHS fatalpa=6 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=USE OF FORCE 

Nigerian soldiers entered Mali in pursuit of rebel forces. Malian troops opened fire on the Nigerian troops. First and last day of dispute was on 2/8/1993.

RIVNOTES:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
